resources.string:
What\'s New with Field Nation

Improved overall performance when uploading a file, allow the app to open from a work order link, and added the ability to call a work order contact directly from the work order lists.

What we added:
  • Ability to copy/paste on work order message
  • Enhancements to our profile picture upload
  • Call a work order contact directly from the work order lists
Bugs we fixed:
  • Splash screen hanging after clearing data
  • Links to work order details not opening in the app
  • Unable to upload a file
    • On a tasks
    • In landscape mode
